Introduction

PURPLEBECK was a South Korean girl group under Majesty Entertainment. They made their debut on June 24, 2019 with the digital single "Crystal Ball".

As of July 2021, La Yeon's exclusive contract with Majesty Entertainment had been terminated she left the group.
